Articles.Content: Looking for a decent looking (and small part count) "aircraft" that is an aircraft carrier to be put in Kerbin's waters!

Infinite Dice's Boat Parts kinda works if you install Better Buoyancy too. You'll need to pump fuel around to balance it though.

Alternatively, don't install the plugins included in the pack, otherwise it'll sink to the bottom without Better Buoyancy.

Edited September 6, 2015 by colmo
